- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

-  substringNotRequired 

Type Property# substringNotRequired

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
static var substringNotRequired: NSString.EnumerationOptions { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/foundation/nsstring/enumerationoptions/substringnotrequired#Discussion)

A way to indicate that the block does not need substring, in which case `nil` will be passed. This is simply a performance shortcut.

## [See Also](/documentation/foundation/nsstring/enumerationoptions/substringnotrequired#see-also)
